Rulings.Edison: ●A cost is not damage so this card’s effect does not apply against Chain Energy, or costs for Imperial Order, etc.

Rulings.Goat:
●A cost is not damage so this card’s effect does not apply against Chain Energy, or costs for Imperial Order, etc.
●Q: Would the opponent receive damage from “Dark Room of Nightmare” when losing LP from the effects of “Toll” and “Chain Energy”? 
A: The effect of “Toll” and “Chain Energy” is not damage, so “Dark Room of Nightmare” will have no involvement in those card’s effects.
